title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table exhibit varying formats when displayed in a dynamic text item compared to a data/text item.
EB: Datetime values retrieved from the table should consistently display the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from the table.
2. Display the values in a dynamic text item.
3. Display the values in a data/text item.
4. Observe the difference in formats between the two items.
